title: Getting random DC while changing masteries/runes
body:
I just recently purchased a HP Omen Laptop, and I'm running it hard-lined with a 100MB/s connection. Nothing else is disconnecting, I'm having no trouble with surfing the internet, but randomly my client will just give me the error message that It's trying to reconnect, and then never does. Then when I close the client, and re-open, it will give me more error messages before it finally lets me log back in. I haven't tried playing a game because I'm a little nervous of being DC'd and getting reported/banned. 

Any ideas here?

replies.body: This might be more of a settings related issue rather than your connection speed. Let's double check your network configurations first really quickly to cover the basics. Use our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a resource for updating your port forwarding and DNS settings, and be sure to test those changes in a custom game first!
